image.title: Redmi K80 Pro MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater

item.title: MIUI OS2.0.15.0.VOMCNXM Fastboot update for Redmi K80 Pro China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi K80 Pro China

Codename: miro

Version: OS2.0.15.0.VOMCNXM | 15.0

Size: 10.3 GB

MD5: fe9b04cb11e70d5f68cb2834ad3a44d0

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: Touchscreen experience
Fix: An issue with incorrect Always-on display clock
Fix: Swiping during folder opening unintentionally launched apps
Fix: Overlapping text layout issues on Weibo
Fix: Device froze and rebooted unexpectedly in some cases
Fix: Occasional Bluetooth connection issues in specific scenarios
Fix: Data update errors for certain widgets in App vault
Fix: Occasional crashes when accessing Home screen folders
[Camera]
New: 32MP resolution for the ultra wide angle lens photos is now supported in Pro mode

Download: Here
